properties.name: Iguazu Falls (Argentina side)
properties.description: 275 waterfalls including Devil's Throat with boat rides into the spray

properties.name: Perito Moreno Glacier
properties.description: Advancing glacier in Los Glaciares National Park with dramatic ice calving

properties.name: Mount Fitz Roy
properties.description: Iconic jagged granite peak, crown jewel of El Chalten hiking

properties.name: Laguna de los Tres
properties.description: Stunning teal lake with Fitz Roy backdrop, Patagonia's most iconic view

properties.name: Ushuaia
properties.description: Southernmost city in the world, gateway to Antarctica

properties.name: Ruta 40
properties.description: Legendary 5,000km highway crossing 20 national parks and Patagonian steppe

properties.name: Seven Lakes Route
properties.description: Scenic drive connecting Villa La Angostura to Bariloche through lake district

properties.name: El Chalten
properties.description: Hiking capital of Argentina with trailheads to Fitz Roy and Cerro Torre

properties.name: Quebrada de Humahuaca
properties.description: UNESCO valley with colorful mountains and pre-Columbian settlements

properties.name: Peninsula Valdes
properties.description: UNESCO site for whale watching, penguins, and sea lion colonies

properties.name: Buenos Aires (Obelisco)
properties.description: Capital city with iconic Obelisk monument and vibrant culture

properties.name: Mendoza Wine Region
properties.description: Premier wine country at Andean foothills with world-class Malbec

properties.name: Tierra del Fuego National Park
properties.description: Protected wilderness at the end of the world near Ushuaia
